Text: i have been messing with this source for a few hours now.  its out of sync in my mind.  in VLC add +200 ms.  or remux it with mkvmerge and add 200 ms delay to the audio track.

Pay no attention to poppedtart. There are no issues with this release.

VLC is shit. The file plays perfectly in MPC.

http://www.cccp-project.net/

maybe my ear is different than yours.

try clips 34:40 and 36:12 then add +200 in VLC and play again.  Looks better to me.  Most people wont care one way or the other.
Perfect copy, thanks insinuendo.  I'm really starting to enjoy this series.  Might have to download the pdf of the original novel to read on my sony reader.
